availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a merchant in Mercer County. Owned two slaves in 1850.

Spouse: Annie M McGrath,
Children: Mary A McGrath, George R McGrath, James T McGrath

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, page 18.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 1, page 2.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), population schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 1, page 64.
U.S. Find A Grave Index, 1600-Present, R. P. McGrath, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=136660426&ref=acom accessed 06/03/2017.
